title: N172 Old Judge Clark Griffith Rookie For Sale
author: paul

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Clark Griffith Rookie For Sale
posts.post_content:
THE GRIFFITH IS SOLD.  THANKS EVERYONE.

Up for sale is Hall of Famer Clark Griffith's rookie card.  It also happens to be the largest N172 Old Judge I've ever seen, by far.  For comparison, I've included another Old Judge ("Long and Short") in the scan.  (The "Long and Short" card isn't for sale).  You'll see that Griffith is much "longer" than "Long and Short."  

The card has a pink tint.  It is pose number 5 in the new Old Judge book.

$760 shipped and insured.  Please email me at [url]pstewart@kmob.com[/url].
